remarks:
A utility lemma to transfer a bound-variable hypothesis builder into a definition.  See ~ hbxfreq for equality version.  (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) 

---

 A utility lemma to transfer a bound-variable hypothesis builder into a definition.  (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)
statement:
hbxfrbi.1 $e |- ( ph <-> ps ) $.
hbxfrbi.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
hbxfrbi $p |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
